lead_paragraph: A recording between Steve Hoskins, Barry Bonds’s former business manager, and Dr. Arthur Ting, his orthopedic surgeon, could resolve a discrepancy in the men’s testimony.
snippet: A recording between Steve Hoskins, Barry Bonds’s former business manager, and Dr. Arthur Ting, his orthopedic surgeon, could resolve a discrepancy in the men’s testimony.
